item.title: How will I use my new side blog?
item.author: Author
item.description: Today I decided to start a new journey in Medium. Perhaps you have noticed in my about section that I have always been interested in documenting my work and write about it, or as Austin Kleon would have said, this is a “Daily Dispatch” where I will show pieces of work, or at least i will try to ðŸ¤” However, I will use this platform to keep track of the progress of my recent projects in Data Science and some Analytical stuff, in a not exactly final-product way, but like a notebook.
